description:
This task is simply a design/evaluation task.
Motivation: Current Grid/Datatable in Mifos angular webapp is not so user friendly and filters are not intuitive.
1. the Student should check if Syncfusion can release for Mifos-X an opensource license for the Angular.js grid component https://www.syncfusion.com/products/community-contact-us
2.  If he/she succeed should individuate which actions (with the help of the mentor) are needed to replace the current mifos-x datatable with the enhanced one and make a plan.
name: Evaluation of a a new grid support in Mifos-webapp
